item.description:
Join for a relaxing Sunday brunch and live jazz music at Ryles in Cambridge. Meet new people and have a fun time. Ryles has a very popular jazz brunch- great food at reasonable prices and great music!

Check out their menu at: http://www.rylesjazz....

Each member pays for their own food/drink. Please do not be late because Ryles will not seat guests until the entire party has arrived. If you can not attend, please be sure to update your RSVP.

If you have trouble finding our group, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. The reservation is under the name, Catherine.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine upstairs near the entrance. If need to, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Enjoy Jazz Brunch at Ryles, Cambridge
